document_data.name: ''Lump's War Horn''
document_data.creator: [[Lump (ogre)|Lump]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Lump's war horn''''' was a unique [[war horn]] created and carried by the brilliant [[ogre]] mercenary, [[Lump (ogre)|Lump the magnificent]].

{{Quote|Use it when the need arises - and never a moment before.|Lump the Magnificent.}}
document_data.Description: The mouthpiece of the horn was encrusted with bits of food.
document_data.Powers:
When sounded, ''Lump's war horn'' would alert Lump and his allies [[Chock]] and [[Fank]]. The mercenaries would respond to the call, aiding whomever sounded it during their next battle. In return, the trio of ogres expected to feast upon any creatures they slew during the fight.

The ogres would typically try to avoid harming whomever sounded the horn, but that was not a complete certainty.
document_data.History: The horn still remained in the possession of its creator as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
